review: Experience was good. I would recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Doctor was listening to my problem that I said to him. Doctor behaviour was good while talking and explaining the issue, and the suggestions he gave was helpful to solve the problem. I'm satisfied with the consultation and the treatment of the doctor.

Happen to meet the doctor my consultation experience was great. It was good, actually, we visited for my friend and he was satisfied with Dr. Charanjit, the doctor was listening to his problems, his experience as of now was good no need to improve I don''t find any false, doctors behaviour was kind and good.

*** ********* ***** ************ ********* ****** * ***************** ****** ** *** *she had severe osteoporosis and she got hurt in her back...he completely cured it..now she can walk without fear**** **** ** ** *** **** ****he hears the patients problems..only thing he is very busy..he can make up time with patients...and hospital is co..operative..

My family finally advised that I should go to MIOT hospital after visiting two or three hospitals due to my mother's spinal disorders surgery problem. There, I met Dr. Charanjit Singh Dhillon, and they quickly identified the issues within a few hours. They recommended having spinal surgery and explained the costs along with other procedures; everything is fine aside from the surgery's price tag. As a middle-class family visiting MIOT hospital because of your excellent surgery, I am aware of the tremendous  of work and effort you put in. I kindly ask the doctor and MIOT hospital administration to extend a discount to middle-class families. After Sale our house, we had to pay for the surgery. Every hospital has a department dedicated to raising money for our middle class citizens. a score of 10/10

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Went for Sciatica pain, the assistant doctor ordered an mri and told the mri which i have is 4month old mri *** ** ** ** ** *** **** then after all scans i meet him and he straight away asked me get a date for surgery, very little explanation about my problem and told the cost as 2,75,000 plus room charges around 1-1.5L. Didn't suggest any other surgery and said only spinal fusion can be done.

We had visited the hospital and it was health problem for my family member and we consulted for a surgery. Doctor was good. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. *********** *** *****
Very good experienced doctor he solved my lumbar spine problem with stabilisation surgery now I don't have any pain and now I'm doing all regular activities. My sincere thanks to Dr C S Dhilon.

My mother had visited the hospital and it was health problem. ********* *** **** ** ****** *** he responded well. He checked properly and it was nice experience. I would like to recommend this doctor for my family and friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done like MRI, X-ray. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. My mom is recovering now, she had spine surgery L4 L5,  5 years back which was done by Dr. Charanjit. Exercise was suggested.

My colleague had met the doctor as he had spinal related issue. Consultation was fine with the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor for my family and friends. Patient is satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was less waiting time in the hospital, we waited for only 15 minutes. It was spinal related issue.

My brother-in-law had consulted the doctor as he met with a bike accident and also had back related issue. Consultation experience was good with the doctor.  I have already recommended the doctor to my family or friends.  Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. They told to come after 3 months. X-ray was suggested. Surgery was done. Diet restrictions was told, patient was overweight actually so doctor advised him to reduce weight.

Doctor behaviour was good while talking and explaining the issue, and the suggestions he gave was helpful to solve the problem. I'm satisfied with the consultation and the treatment of the doctor.
